update.description:
The code that initializes the Redis data and creates the constellation directory to store the keys and credentials has been moved into launchers_utils.  
There, it will be accessible by create_cloudsim and unit tests that have no visibility on cloudsimd.py
update.title: simplify launch before eliminating cloudsim bootstrap

content.html:
How about this?

def constellation_is_terminated(constellation_name):
    expire = True
    try:
        constellation = ConstellationState(constellation_name)
        constellation_state = constellation.get_value("constellation_state")
        expire = constellation_state == "terminated"
    except:
        log("Can't access constellation  %s data" % constellation_name)

    if expire:
        try:
            constellation.expire(1)
        except:
            pass

    return expire
